title: Art section redesign
content:
Hi,

I’m redesigning the art section of the newspaper I’m working for and I’m looking for a fresh looking type for the headlines. I really like SoHo from Sebastian Lester. But I’m not 100% sure. What do you think? Do you have some alternatives or suggestions?

Thank you very much

——

alainch

 [‹ Scientific American - How to Unleash Your Creativity](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603213902/http:/typophile.com/node/45854 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pictogram fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603213902/http:/typophile.com/node/45848 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alainch

comments.content: It has a good range. What sort of depth/range to the local museums have? I can’t see SoHo for a Turner show.

That’s what I was expecting. They write about dance, theater, classical music and visual arts but mostly about cinema, music and also TV.

Any suggestions?

- - -

alainch
